title: Where does Eddie Van Halen line up politically? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of Van Halen have done their best with publicly staying as far away from politics as possible, which is one of the smartest things that they have done so that they don’t divide their fan base. This is a common stance with most artists, because they don’t want their fan base to get sliced in half overnight because the artist publicly chose to take a side.

He doesn’t publicly affiliate himself with one party or another. He may be an independent thinker who doesn’t care to be cast as one or the other party or he may simply choose to not let his political beliefs be known publicly so as not to alienate segments of his fanbase.
